message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $14,000.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $14,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  I'd be willing to pay $11,000 for it.  Let me know what you think.
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to save some money, but I have to make a living too. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $13,000. Let me know if that works for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $13,000 is still a bit high for me. I'm sticking with my offer of $11,000.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm sure we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I understand you're sticking to your offer, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to make one more concession, so I'm counteroffering at $12,500. This is as low as I'm willing to go, so let me know if you're interested.
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility.  I'm still hoping to get it for $11,000, but I'm willing to go up to $12,250. This is a good compromise, and I'm confident we can close the deal.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I'm not willing to go above $13,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm counteroffering at $12,625. This is my final concession, so let me know if you're willing to meet me in the middle.

Alice, I'm getting closer to my target, but $12,625 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $12,375.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I hope we can reach an agreement.

Bob, I'm starting to think we're getting a bit too close to the wire. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm counteroffering at $12,500, which is still a bit higher than your last offer, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle this time.
